sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardHeader, CardContent } from "../components/ui/card"; import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from "../components/ui/tabs"; import { User, Activity, Target, AlertTriangle, MapPin, Briefcase, Clock, Star, Laptop, // 新增 Mail, // 新增 Calendar // 新增 } from 'lucide-react'; const DynamicPersona = () => { const [currentJourney, setCurrentJourney] = useState(0); const persona = { basic: { name: "Emma Tran", age: 20, location: "UC Irvine", occupation: "Computer Science Student", year: "Junior", quote: "I need a more organized and reliable experience that will allow me to focus on my studies without distractions." }, behaviors: [ { title: "Daily Usage", description: "Checks Canvas daily for assignments, calendar and course materials", icon: }, { title: "Device Preference", description: "Primarily uses laptop for accessing Canvas", icon: // 需要添加 Laptop 到 import }, { title: "Communication", description: "Prefers Gmail for professor communication, minimal Canvas inbox usage", icon: // 需要添加 Mail 到 import } ], goals: [ "Efficient Assignment Tracking: Check calendar daily for deadlines", "Organized Course Material Access: Have a centralized hub for resources", "Streamlined Communication: Manage professor interactions effectively", "Controlled Notifications: Reduce notification overload" ], painPoints: [ "Inconsistent Course Page Layouts make finding materials difficult", "Calendar Sync Issues causing potential missed deadlines", "Overwhelming notifications flood inbox", "Limited video upload capacity requiring YouTube workarounds" ], journey: [ { stage: "Morning", emotion: "Focused", actions: "Checks To-Do list and Calendar for upcoming assignments", expectations: "Clear overview of daily tasks" }, { stage: "Midday", emotion: "Engaged", actions: "Works on assignments, reviews lecture notes and materials", expectations: "Easy access to course content" }, { stage: "Evening", emotion: "Productive", actions: "Updates personal calendar and marks completed tasks", expectations: "Efficient task tracking and organization" } ] }; return (

{persona.basic.name}

{persona.basic.occupation} {persona.basic.location}

"{persona.basic.quote}"

 Behaviors Goals Pain Points Journey
{persona.behaviors.map((behavior, index) => (
{behavior.icon}

{behavior.title}

{behavior.description}

))}
{persona.goals.map((goal, index) => (
{goal}
))}
{persona.painPoints.map((point, index) => (
{point}
))}
{persona.journey.map((stage, index) => (
setCurrentJourney(index)} >

{stage.stage}

Emotion

{stage.emotion}

Actions

{stage.actions}

Expectations

{stage.expectations}

))}
); }; export default DynamicPersona;
